extracted-table.table-caption: The strength of the connections identified between parcellations of the salience network

caption.p: The strength of the connections identified between parcellations of the salience network

tr.th: Average tracts across brains when present
Average tracts across brains when present

fn.p: Note: Two different values for strength are recorded based on the average number of tracts across all subjects versus the average number of tracts across subjects in which the connection was identified. The LI is calculated using the formula (right average – left average)/(right average + left average). Left and right average tract volumes were compared with the unpaired Wilcoxon rank‐sum test (uncorrected).

Abbreviations: a24pr, anterior 24 prime; a32pr, anterior 32 prime; AVI, areas anterior ventral insula; FAT, frontal anterior tract; FOP4, frontal operculum 4; FOP5, frontal operculum 5; MI, middle insula; SCEF, supplementary and cingulate eye field.

extracted-table.table-caption: Function of each cortical region of interest included in our model and their relative locations according to the Human Connectome Project (HCP) parcellation scheme

caption.p: Function of each cortical region of interest included in our model and their relative locations according to the Human Connectome Project (HCP) parcellation scheme

tr.td: Salience node; responsible for human awareness, self‐recognition, perceptual decision making; autonomic processes
Salience node; responsible for human awareness, self‐recognition, perceptual decision making; autonomic processes
Initiation of language and lexical retrieval
Initiation of language and lexical retrieval; motor activity (likely more than FOP4)
Cognitive response selection (especially for language‐based tasks)

td.p: Influences attention allocation and moto preparation by evaluating
stimuli according to motivation and reward

tr.td: Stimulus and response selection (especially related to linguistic and sensory information)
Guides oculomotor behavior according to goals
Goal‐directed behavior; key target for depression

fn.p: Abbreviations: a24pr, anterior 24 prime; a32pr, anterior 32 prime; AVI, areas anterior ventral insula; FAT, frontal anterior tract; FOP4, frontal operculum 4; FOP5, frontal operculum 5; MI, middle insula; MNI, Montreal Neuroimaging Institute; SCEF, supplementary and cingulate eye field.
